page.title: 02INTRODUCTION
page.content: Generally the area has beautiful scenery with minor roads and pathways for pleasant walks. There are a number of small communities, separated by farmland.There has been some ribbon development along the line of A38 and Stock Lane.At the time of writing there are plans to build large numbers of new houses as well as infilling.This is causing some controversy locally. The plan is to complete the building of houses in an area boarded by the A38, Stock Lane,Pudding Pie Lane and Ladymead Lane.According to the 1930's Ordnance Survey there were only two properties in this area;Churchill Primary School and Hotel Farm, or the Stag and Hounds Hotel as it is now known.150 houses are to be built shortly to complete the block.
